Well if the dynamic turning point of an anti-gravitational field, acting upon the stratosphere of an anhydrous solid, which has been exposed to the radiation produced by biochemical nuclear waste was to spontaneously combust, leaving you with an endless supply of carcinagenic energy waves, how would you fix the problem? I cannot see that it is fixable, as the hypothesis that endless waves of energy, which is in a hydronucleic form, can be stopped using any form of enzyme is preposterous, yet if the hadron collider was to be infused with genetically enhanced biobacteria, using exothermic reactions to heat the intersect, you might, just might be able to distort the waves out of proportion, allowing them to split harmlessly into the atmosphere. Although the question would be, how can you genetically enhance the bacteria to allow them to create enough glycerin as is needed?

We were dressed and ready to go out for the New Years Eve Party. We turned on a night light, turned the answering machine on, covered our pet parakeet and put the cat in the backyard. We phone the local cab company and requested a taxi. The taxi arrived and we opened the front door to leave the house. The cat we put out in the back yard, scoots back into the front door. We didn't want the cat shut in the house bec
My wife goes out to the taxi, while I went inside to get the cat. The cat runs upstairs, with me in hot pursuit. Waiting in the cab, my wife doesn't want the driver to know that the house will be empty for the night. So, she explains to the taxi driver that I will be out soon, 'He's just going upstairs to say Goodbye to my mother.'
A few minutes later, I get into the cab. 'Sorry I took so long,' I said, as we drove away. 'That stupid bitch was hiding under the bed. I had to poke her with a coat hanger to get her to come
out! She tried to take off, so I grabbed her by the neck. Then, I had to wrap her in a blanket to keep her from scratching me. But it worked! I hauled her fat ass downstairs and threw her out into the back yard!'
The cab driver hit a parked car.

13It's more fun to guess
When I found out that Nestl had been selling powder milk to mothers in poor countries, which are already too poor to afford it, quite frankly, I was shocked and disgusted. I thought that this company would be better than this, yet it is endangering lives for money. There are some of the reasons as to why you should stop.
With formula milk you need to mix it with water, and many of the countries in which the powder milk is sold do not have clean water, which can lead to children getting diseases, especially as infants are very vulnerable, and will end up with many unnecessary deaths.
Another reason is that as many of the mothers buying the formula milk are so poor, they use even less of the formula as is needed, to make it last longer, resulting in some children not receiving enough nutrients, because its too weak.
Also, the formula milk doesnt contain many of the natural benefits that breast milk does, such as some nutrients and antibodies, which provide somewhat of a protection for many illnesses, such as, diarrhea, bacterial meningitis, gastroenteritis, ear infections, and respiratory infection. Breast milk also contains the right amount of nutrients for development of the brain and nerves.
I think that's enough.

I think its just flash
mcname._xscale=(_root.getBytesLoaded()/_root.getBytesTotal())*100;
it comes down to the speed of your pc because flash does take CPU to process.
That's for a bar ^
And
I had to introduce my teacher to flash kit lol
You should use a round function because you can't have half pixels.
If you want text under it, with percentage loaded
textname.text=Math.round((_root.getBytesLoaded()/_root.getBytesTotal())*100)+"%";
Then to stop it leaving that frame, unless it's loaded
if (_root.getBytesTotal() != _root.getBytesLoaded()){
gotoAndPlay(1);
}
That's it.
